disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from A Harmless Scarecrow.

description.value: Innate - Scarecrow Effigy: Fiddlesticks begins the game with an exclusive Scarecrow Effigy, which permanently occupies the trinket slot. Fiddlesticks can pretend to be an Effigy, after standing still for 2 seconds, adjusting its body into a scarecrow and extending its arm out to expose its lantern. Its health bar is also hidden to enemies while idle, similarly to an Effigy. However, casting Crowstorm will cancel it early.

description2.value: Innate - A Harmless Scarecrow: From level 6 onward, placing an Effigy also summons a demonic eyeball at the location that grants obscured vision of enemy units in the area for 6 seconds, which also reveals and disables enemy wards and stealthed traps.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Effigies will mimic Fiddlesticks' idle animations and have their health bar hidden until they fake an action. If Fiddlesticks pretends to be an effigy, the health bar stays hidden until the animation is interrupted or it takes damage. The health bar will come back into view immediately but will instantly vanish if Fiddlesticks remains idle the moment it stops taking damage. Channeling a spell interrupts the pose and does not activate it either. The pose is special cased to only be interrupted by Bountiful Harvest's cast once the tethers are applied. Effigies are considered clones, but they are not valid targets to direction, ground, and auto-targeted abilities the moment they are placed, a short amount of time must elapse before they are targetable to them. The trinket slot can still be temporarily replaced by Eye of the Herald. - Surprise Party Fiddlesticks has a special icon for this ability.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Terrify.

description.value: Passive: While Fiddlesticks has been out of combat for at least 2.5 seconds and is unseen by the enemy team, or is pretending to be an Effigy, Fiddlesticks' next damaging ability fears all targets struck.

description2.value: Targets feared by Fiddlesticks are placed on a cooldown equal to Terrify's cooldown, during which they cannot be feared by it again.

description3.value: Active: Fiddlesticks screeches at the target enemy, dealing magic damage and fearing them. This has a minimum damage threshold and is capped at 400 against monsters.

leveling3.value: Magic Damage:»6 / 7 / 8 / 9 / 10% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's current health«Minimum Damage:40 / 60 / 80 / 100 / 120

description4.value: Against targets with a cooldown, Terrify instead will have its damage and minimum threshold doubled.

leveling4.value: Increased Magic Damage:»12 / 14 / 16 / 18 / 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP) of target's current health«Increased Minimum Damage:80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240

description5.value: Minions are always feared if Fiddlesticks is not attacking them and there is no enemy champion in its view.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The fear-immunity timer is not refreshed by subsequent attempts to fear the target. The fear is applied at the end of the cast time, regardless of the target's distance or the missile landing. The missile cannot be destroyed, either. Fiddlesticks is considered "seen" if it is visible and is inside an enemy champion's sight radius. Vision from minions, wards, and turrets will not prevent Fiddlesticks from fearing if there are no nearby enemy champions. There is a very brief grace period after being seen but not when entering combat. Monsters may be feared with the same condition as champions. Vision from the enemy team will not prevent the fear from triggering versus neutral monsters, and vice versa. The passive portion does not currently communicate any information to Fiddlesticks, its allies nor its enemies. There is no indicator to say that Fiddlesticks is out of combat; and no indicator or debuff icon on affected enemies. A visual indicator will circle around all enemy champions while Fiddlesticks is channeling Crowstorm if it is unseen. This is only visible to Fiddlesticks. Spell shield will not prevent the fear from Crowstorm, but the first tick of damage from the DoT is blocked. The fear immunity applies even if the target is crowd control immune. It is not applied if it is blocked by spell shield, the visual indicator is however. Terrify will still cast and affect the target even if Fiddlesticks dies or loses sight of them during the cast time. Terrify will still cast but not affect the target if they die or become untargetable during the cast time. There is no compensation. The player's screen will have a visual effect when successfully feared by Terrify. Terrify's doubled damage is a cosmetic critical strike. - Surprise Party Fiddlesticks has a special icon for this ability.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bountiful Harvest.

description.value: Active: At the time of cast, Fiddlesticks tethers itself to all nearby enemies, then channels and reveals itself for up to 2 seconds, harvesting their souls.

description2.value: During the channel, tethered enemies are revealed and dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds, with the last tick dealing additional magic damage. Total damage is reduced to 50% against minions.

leveling2.value: Damage per Tick:»15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 8.75% AP)«Last Tick of Damage:»15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 8.75% AP) (+ 12 / 14.5 / 17 / 19.5 / 22% of target's missing health)«Total Magic Damage:120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 70% AP) (+ 12 / 14.5 / 17 / 19.5 / 22% of target's missing health)

description3.value: Fiddlesticks heals itself for a percentage of the pre-mitigation damage dealt, reduced to 15% against minions.

leveling3.value: Heal Percentage:»30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%«Total Heal per Non-Minion:»36 / 63 / 96 / 135 / 180 (+ 21 / 24.5 / 28 / 31.5 / 35% AP) (+ 7.2 / 9.45 / 12 / 14.85 / 18% of target's missing health)«Total Heal per Minion:9 / 13.5 / 18 / 22.5 / 27 (+ 5.25% AP) (+ 1.8 / 2.025 / 2.25 / 2.475 / 2.7% of target's missing health)

description4.value: Bountiful Harvest ends if all targets have died or broken their tethers. If the channel was not interrupted, 60% of the remaining  cooldown is refunded.

description5.value: A target enemy is required to cast this ability. Fiddlesticks does not need sight of the target to tether itself to them.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

notes.value: * Spell shield will block applying the tether but will not block damage from one already applied. PENDING FOR TEST: Spell effects ( persistent area damage or persistent damage?) - Surprise Party Fiddlesticks has a special icon for this ability. The following table refers for interactions while Fiddlesticks is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Interrupts Abilities Interrupts Movement Interrupts Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled N/A Interrupted by Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Mark Dash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Reap.

description.value: Active: Fiddlesticks slashes all enemies in the target area with its scythe, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.

description2.value: Enemies hit in the center of the area are also silenced for 1.25 seconds.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Crowstorm.

description.value: Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Fiddlesticks blinks to the target location with a murder of crows flying wildly around it for 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Roots do not interrupt the ability despite being a movement channel. Crowstorm, after it has been channeled, persists through stasis. Fiddlesticks will always blink to its intended location even if its position changes during the channel without being interrupted (e.g. by Realm Warp). - Surprise Party Fiddlesticks has a special icon for this ability. The following table refers for interactions while Fiddlesticks is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death Grounding effects Silencing effects
